title: Refined Riyadh Retreat in Urban Oasis
description: Escape to an urban oasis in the heart of Saudi Arabia's capital at the voco Riyadh, an IHG Hotel. This centrally located hotel is only a few minutes from the Riyadh Park Mall, perfect for enjoying some retail therapy. Savour a variety of global cuisines at the onsite restaurants or escape the heat at the pool before lounging in luxury with a cocktail at the Cabana poolside bar. Take relaxation to the next level with a soothing and tailored treatment at Soul Spa & Wellness.
offer_address: Opposite of Ministry of Interior, King Fahd Rd, An Namudhajiyah, Riyadh 13003, Saudi Arabia
